overview: David Morris is responsible for managing legal issues at the TripAdsvisor Media Gaoup. Prior to joining TripAdvisor in 2008, he spent five years as Senior Counsel at Invensys PLC. Prior to that, David also worked at Millennium Pharmaceuticals and the law firm of Hinckley, Allen & Snyder. David has a J.D. from Boston University School of Law, an M.S. from Boston University School of Communications, a B.A. from Brandeis University, and is completing an M.B.A. at Suffolk University.
